modules.description: This module implements email submission and delivery over SMTP with support for TLS, authentication, and custom encoders/decoders. It operates on network destinations specified as domain names or IP addresses, using socket connections managed through the provided `Socket` and `Happy_eyeballs` modules. Concrete use cases include sending authenticated emails through SMTP servers, handling message queues, and managing secure connections with STARTTLS.

This module enables email submission and delivery over SMTP with TLS, authentication, and customizable encoders and decoders. It connects to SMTP servers using domain names or IP addresses, leveraging the `Socket` and `Happy_eyeballs` modules for network communication. Main data types include SMTP configurations, email messages, and connection states. You can use it to send authenticated emails, manage message queues, and establish secure SMTP sessions with STARTTLS.
